segments.text: Hello , Mr . Stern . This is Hao Bo from the International Travel Agency . I have made the plane reservations for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , good . Let me get a pencil and take down the information . Well , go ahead , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . You'll be travelling on Northwest Airlines , flight number 222 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It departs Guangzhou at 10:30 on the morning of July 10 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You want to fly first class . Is that correct , Mr . Stern ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have got you three first class tickets and I have reserved your seats . Your seat numbers are 8A , 8B and 8C .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are in the non-smoking section , aren't they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they are . I have charged the tickets to your credit card . They are 630 dollars each , so It is 1890 dollars for all three .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One more thing . Could you give me the names of the people you'll be travelling with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . They are my kids , Alex and Kathy Stern .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . You're all set . Have a nice flight .
segments.speaker: S2
